title: Fastest Operating License Acquisition
description: In 2019, Poland achieved the fastest time to obtain an operating license, taking only 1.2 days, according to World Bank data.

title: 100% Female Primary Education Completion
description: By 2021, Poland reached a 100% persistence rate for females completing the last grade of primary education, showcasing a strong commitment to female education.

title: Minimal Child Stunting Rates
description: In 2024, Poland recorded a stunting prevalence of just 1% among children under five, indicating excellent child health and nutrition standards.

title: Low Health Expenditure-Induced Poverty
description: In 2020, only 0.01% of Poland's population was pushed further below the $3.65 poverty line due to out-of-pocket health care expenses, reflecting effective health care policies.
